addAnt() - Method in class Colony
this method generates new ants based on the location of the class Ant which is added to the arraylist ants
addAnt(int) - Method in class Colony
this method generates new ants based on the location of the class Ant which is added to the arraylist ants in addition this method offers the ability to specify the number of ants that should be added.
addAnt(Menu) - Method in class Colony
this method is related to the ant icon on the menu when the ant icon is clicked 1 ant is added the maximum number of ants that can exist is 40.
addAnt() - Method in class Menu
this method is called in the ant class
addBiscuit() - Method in class FoodSource
this method adds the food particle to the grid arraylist this food particle represents the biscuit because its id number is 1 so the whole arraylist will be filled with biscuit this method is used in the Menu class in order to add food according to its type
addBiscuitFromMenu(float, float, FoodSource) - Method in class Menu
add biscuit and display a biscuit cursor if biscuit was selected
addFood - Variable in class FoodSource
check if the food is selected from the menu.
addFoodIcon(float, float, int, boolean, int) - Method in class FoodSource
this method adds the food grid arraylist whenever it is called this method is to be displayed on the menu as an icon exclusivly
addFoodPheromone() - Method in class Ant
this method gets the ant's location, where its coordinates will be inserted into the ArrayList of food trail and accordingly the food pheromone will be created.
addHomePheromone() - Method in class Ant
this method gets the ant's location, where its coordinates will be inserted into the ArrayList of home trail and accordingly the home pheromone will be created.
addSugar() - Method in class FoodSource
this method adds the food particle to the grid arraylist this food particle represents the sugar because its id number is 2 so the whole arraylist will be filled with biscuit this method is used in the Menu class in order to add food according to its type
addSugarFromMenu(float, float, FoodSource) - Method in class Menu
add sugar and display a biscuit cursor if sugar was selected
addToxic() - Method in class FoodSource
this method adds the food particle to the grid arraylist this food particle represents the toxic because its id number is 3 so the whole arraylist will be filled with biscuit this method is used in the Menu class in order to add food according to its type
addToxicFromMenu(float, float, FoodSource) - Method in class Menu
add toxic and display a biscuit cursor if toxic was selected
addToxicPheromone() - Method in class Ant
this method gets the ant's location, where its coordinates will be inserted into the ArrayList of toxic trail and accordingly the toxic pheromone will be created.

this method makes the ant get eaten by the predator when it attacks it.
eatFood(PVector) - Method in class FoodSource
this method simulates the event that the ant is picking food particle from the food in fact the when the ant comes to a proximity from the food a food particle will be deleted according to it sequential positioning in the arraylist and a new rectangle is drawn in Colony class creating the illusion of the ant picking up food

F

findFood(FoodSource, FoodSource, FoodSource, boolean) - Method in class Ant
this method lets the ant detect the food when it approaches at a certain distance from it the ant wanders around looking for food if food is selected and the ant smells the food it arrive() to the food source.
